options.description:
This collection of plugins (and loader) make up what I started calling the DAK
This mod can be downloaded via SteamWorkshop, and will autodownload on all clients on connect. The ModID for DAK is 5f4f178, which you will want to set in the server command line, and in MapCycle.json. The server will automatically download the mod once set.
More information or questions should be handled via the NS2 forum, http://www.unknownworlds.com/ns2/forums/index.php?showtopic=120542 You can also check the readme provided with the workshop files (or on github - https://github.com/xToken/DAK)
options.title: DAK Admin Kit
